short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that helps you convert any images to popular formates in your browser (offline).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Using this extension, convert any image to more widely accepted and optimised formates. Useful for developers, designers and convenient for anyone! 

How it works
1.  Install extension
2.  Click on extension icon from extensions menu or open new tab
3.  Select which format you want to convert into
4.  Drag and drop file or click into drag area to manually select
5.  Save converted file when promoted

Works offline like a charm âœ¨
